trans-unit.source: Represents a selectable item in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representerar ett objekt som kan väljas i en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> contains a collection of ListBoxItem objects.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>innehåller en samling objekt ListBoxItem.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: To select a ListBoxItem in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem.IsSelected%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Att välja en ListBoxItem i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, ange den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem.IsSelected%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem.IsSelected%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: Bind a ListBoxItem to data by binding the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> to a data source.
trans-unit.target: Binda ett ListBoxItem till data genom att binda den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>egenskapen för en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>till en datakälla.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Bind a ListBox to Data](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [så här: en ListBox binda till Data](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: You can customize the appearance of a ListBoxItem by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> to a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan anpassa utseendet på en ListBoxItem genom att ange <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>egenskapen för en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>till <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [Templating översikt över](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> of a ListBoxItem is set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>.
trans-unit.target: Som standard <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>för en ListBoxItem är inställd på <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>.</xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default horizontal position of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> is <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>.
trans-unit.target: Vågrät placering en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>är <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>.</xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> property of a ListBoxItem through a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>, the panel's default is applied and the item is centered.
trans-unit.target: Om du ställer in den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>egenskapen för en ListBoxItem via en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>panelens standard tillämpas och artikeln är uppbyggd.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: A ListBoxItem is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel).
trans-unit.target: En ListBoxItem är en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, vilket innebär att den kan innehålla ett enskilt objekt av en annan typ (till exempel en sträng, en bild eller en panel).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>klassen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: Customizing the ListBoxItem Control To apply the same property settings to multiple ListBoxItem controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Anpassa den ListBoxItem kontroll att använda samma egenskapsinställningar för flera ListBoxItem kontroller, Använd den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ändra standard <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>att ge unik för kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om hur du skapar en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, se [anpassa utseendet på en befintlig kontroll genom att skapa en ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the ListBoxItem, see [ListBox Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Delar och tillstånd som är specifika för ListBoxItem finns [ListBox format och mallar](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Beroendeegenskaper för den här kontrollen kan ställas in av kontrollens standardformat.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Om en egenskapen anges av ett standardformat kan egenskapen ändras från standardvärdet när kontrollen visas i programmet.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: Standardformatet som bestäms av vilka tema används när programmet körs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [standard WPF teman](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in ListBoxItem control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Visual egenskapen endast har betydelse om egenskapen är båda finns i ListBoxItem kontrollens standardmall och anges genom att använda en.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: Du hittar en lista över visuella egenskaper i avsnittet "Ändra Visual struktur för ett Control" i [anpassa utseendet på en befintlig kontroll genom att skapa en ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"></xref> is selected.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som anger om en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"> </xref> är markerad.

trans-unit.source: To select a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, set this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Att välja en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, den här egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: ## Beroendeegenskapsinformation ||| |-|-| | ID-fältet | | | Metadata egenskaperna `true`||

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om objektet är markerad. Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem.IsSelected*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem.IsSelected*>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem.IsSelected*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Provides an appropriate <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListBoxItemAutomationPeer"></xref> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] automation infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Ger en lämplig <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListBoxItemAutomationPeer"> </xref> implementering för den här kontrollen som en del av den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] automation-infrastruktur.

trans-unit.source: The type-specific <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Typ-specifika <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> implementering.

trans-unit.source: Called when the mouse enters a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anropas när musen flyttas till en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Called when the mouse leaves a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anropas när musen lämnar en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Called when the user presses the right mouse button over the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anropas när användaren trycker på höger musknapp över den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Called when the user presses the right mouse button over a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anropas när användaren trycker på höger musknapp via en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"></xref> is selected in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anropas när den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"> </xref> är markerat i en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem.IsSelected%2A> property changes to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden anropas när den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem.IsSelected%2A>-egenskapen ändras för `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem.IsSelected%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"></xref> is unselected in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anropas när den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"> </xref> avmarkeras i en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem.IsSelected%2A> property changes to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden anropas när den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem.IsSelected%2A>-egenskapen ändras för `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem.IsSelected%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Called when the visual parent of a list box item changes.
trans-unit.target: Anropas när visuell överordnad för ett objekt ändras.

trans-unit.source: The previous <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den tidigare <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent*>-egenskapen för den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"></xref> is selected.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"> </xref> är markerad.

trans-unit.source: To know when the selection in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> changes, listen for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Du behöver veta när valet i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>ändringar, lyssna efter den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged>händelse.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>
